critique:
The executive order seems to aim at conveying a sense of relief and hope, primarily through the allocation of funds to address agricultural distress. The order does not seem to want to convey anger, fear, or disgust. It may want to convey a bit of surprise. Here's my initial assessment:

Joy: 6 (relief and hope for farmers)
Sadness: 3 (acknowledging the distress in agricultural areas)
Surprise: 4 (the amount of money allocated to help)
Fear: 1 (no intention to scare the audience)
Disgust: 1 (no intention to disgust the audience)
